scripts.build: vite build && npm run build:pages && cp dist/home.html dist/index.html
scripts.watch:pages: concurrently -k "nodemon -w src/views/cameo/Page.pug -x node build-pages.js cameo" "nodemon -w src/views/guillotine/Page.pug -x node build-pages.js guillotine" "nodemon -w src/views/home/Page.pug -x node build-pages.js index" "nodemon -w src/views/invalid/Page.pug -x node build-pages.js invalid" "nodemon -w src/views/meeting/Page.pug -x node build-pages.js meeting" "nodemon -w src/views/pretend/Page.pug -x node build-pages.js pretend" "nodemon -w src/views/sisyphus/Page.pug -x node build-pages.js sisyphus" "nodemon -w src/views/wrongest/Page.pug -x node build-pages.js wrongest" "nodemon -w src/views/stats/Page.pug -x node build-pages.js stats"
